comment.author: 27842168@N04
comment._content:
The title shoud read Iron man Joe McGinnity 
                         Hall of fame pitcher.

comment.author: 47393018@N00
comment._content: Joseph Jerome McGinnity (March 20, 1871 - November 14, 1929), nicknamed Iron Man, was an American right-handed pitcher in Major League Baseball at the turn of the 20th century. Born in Cornwall Township, Henry County, Illinois, he reached the majors in 1899. After a 10 year major league career he continued to pitch in the minor leagues, eventually bowing out of baseball for good at the age of 54, having amassed nearly 500 wins as a professional ballplayer. He was inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 1946. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_McGinnity
